address: Xã Bình Triều, Huyện Thăng Bình, Tỉnh Quảng Nam
thought:
**My Analysis of the Administrative Unit Change**

Okay, so I've been tasked with figuring out the new administrative unit for "Xã Bình Triều, Huyện Thăng Bình, Tỉnh Quảng Nam."  My process will be straightforward and methodical.  First, I've identified the old province, "Tỉnh Quảng Nam." Now, I need to check for any resolutions related to provincial changes. My understanding is that I should be looking at the 60-NQ/TW series of resolutions.  A quick scan reveals a key piece of information: Quảng Nam was merged with Đà Nẵng to become "Thành phố Đà Nẵng". So, the new province is definitely Đà Nẵng.

Next, I need to pinpoint the specific old ward, "Xã Bình Triều." My knowledge of these systems tells me to now search other relevant resolutions outside the 60-NQ/TW framework. Specifically, I'm going to look for "Xã Bình Triều" within any other potential administrative adjustments or reorganizations. Bingo! Resolution 1659/NQ-UBTVQH15 catches my attention: "Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của thành phố Đà Nẵng".  Line 50 of this resolution clearly states the merger of "Xã Bình Triều" with other wards to form a new ward named **"Xã Thăng An"**. This resolution perfectly aligns with the new province I previously identified, "Thành phố Đà Nẵng".

To be absolutely certain, I need to verify this new ward within the current, updated system.  I'll cross-reference "Xã Thăng An" against the newly identified "Thành phố Đà Nẵng" in my data to ensure it is valid. The data confirms this match, giving me absolute certainty. With the ward identified and province verified, I am ready to output the relevant information in the JSON format. This has been a straightforward and definitive analysis.

citation.header: 1659/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của thành phố Đà Nẵng
citation.line: 50. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Bình Triều, Bình Giang, Bình Đào, Bình Minh và Bình Dương thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Thăng An.
